flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
炎を　操る　伝説の　鳥ポケモン。
体が　傷つくと　火口の　マグマに　入り
全身を　燃やして　傷を　癒すと　いう。

Moltres is a legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability
to control fire. If this Pokémon is injured, it is said to dip its
body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.

Moltres è un Pokémon uccello leggendario, perfettamente
in grado di gestire il fuoco. Se rimane ferito, si dice che
si immerga nel magma liquido di un vulcano per ardere
e tornare in salute.

Moltres es un Pokémon pájaro legendario que tiene la
habilidad de controlar el fuego. Dicen que, si resulta herido,
se sumerge en el líquido magma de un volcán para arder y
curarse.

Lavados ist ein Legendäres Vogel-Pokémon, das Feuer
manipulieren kann. Wenn es verletzt wird, taucht es seinen
Körper in das Magma eines Vulkans, um sich zu verbrennen
und selbst zu heilen.

Sulfura est un Pokémon Oiseau légendaire capable de
contrôler le feu. On raconte que lorsque ce Pokémon est
blessé, il se baigne dans le magma en ébullition d’un volcan
pour se soigner.

불꽃을 조종하는 전설의 새포켓몬이다.
몸이 상처 입으면 분화구의 마그마에 들어가
전신을 불태워 상처를 치료한다고 한다.

ほのおを　あやつる　でんせつの　とりポケモン。
からだが　きずつくと　かこうの　マグマに　はいり
ぜんしんを　もやして　きずを　いやすと　いう。

炎を　操る　伝説の　鳥ポケモン。
体が　傷つくと　火口の　マグマに　入り
全身を　燃やして　傷を　癒すと　いう。

Moltres is a legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability to
control fire. If this Pokémon is injured, it is said to dip its body
in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.

Moltres è un Pokémon uccello leggendario, perfettamente
in grado di gestire il fuoco. Se rimane ferito, si dice che
si immerga nel magma liquido di un vulcano per ardere
e tornare in salute.

Moltres es un Pokémon pájaro legendario que tiene la
habilidad de controlar el fuego. Dicen que, si resulta herido,
se sumerge en el líquido magma de un volcán para arder y
curarse.

Lavados ist ein Legendäres Vogel-Pokémon, das Feuer
manipulieren kann. Wenn es verletzt wird, taucht es seinen
Körper in das Magma eines Vulkans, um sich zu verbrennen
und selbst zu heilen.

Sulfura est un Pokémon Oiseau légendaire capable de
contrôler le feu. On raconte que lorsque ce Pokémon est
blessé, il se baigne dans le magma en ébullition d’un volcan
pour se soigner.

불꽃을 조종하는 전설의 새포켓몬이다.
몸이 상처 입으면 분화구의 마그마에 들어가
전신을 불태워 상처를 치료한다고 한다.

ほのおを　あやつる　でんせつの　とりポケモン。
からだが　きずつくと　かこうの　マグマに　はいり
ぜんしんを　もやして　きずを　いやすと　いう。

伝説の　とりポケモンの　１匹。
ファイヤーが　姿を　見せると
春が　訪れると　言われている。

One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that
its appearance indicates the coming of spring.

Un Pokémon uccello leggendario. Si dice che la sua
apparizione preannunci l’arrivo della primavera.

Uno de los legendarios Pokémon pájaro. Dicen que su
presencia anuncia la llegada de la primavera.

Eines der Legendären Vogel-Pokémon. Es wird
als Bote des Frühlings angesehen.

L’un des Pokémon Oiseaux légendaires. On dit que
sa venue annonce l’arrivée du printemps.

전설의 새포켓몬 중의 1마리다.
파이어가 모습을 보이면
봄이 찾아온다고 전해진다.

でんせつの　とりポケモンの　１ぴき。
ファイヤーが　すがたを　みせると
はるが　おとずれると　いわれている。

昔から　火の鳥伝説として
知られる。羽ばたくたびに　羽が
明るく　燃え上がり　美しい。

It is said to be the legendary bird Pokémon of fire.
Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare
of flames.

Noto come uccello leggendario del fuoco, quando
sbatte le ali crea scintillanti lingue infuocate.

Es más conocido como el legendario pájaro de fuego.
Con cada aleteo crea brillantes llamas.

Dieses Pokémon ist der Legendäre Feuervogel.
Sein Flügelschlag entfacht ein helles Feuermeer.

Le légendaire oiseau du feu. Une pluie de flammes
surgit à chaque battement de ses ailes.

오래전부터 불새의 전설로
알려져 있다. 날갯짓할 때마다
날개가 눈부시게 불타올라서 아름답다.

むかしから　ひのとりでんせつとして
しられる。はばたくたびに　はねが
あかるく　もえあがり　うつくしい。

This legendary bird Pokémon is
said to bring early spring to
the wintry lands it visits.

This legendary Pokémon scatters
embers with every flap of its wings.
It is a thrilling sight to behold.

indicates the coming of spring.

It is said to be the legendary bird
POKéMON of fire. Every flap of its wings
creates a dazzling flare of flames.

One of the legendary bird POKéMON.
Those seeing it are overwhelmed by its
orange wings that seem to be on fire.

MOLTRES is a legendary bird POKéMON
that can control fire. If injured, it is said
to dip its body in the molten magma of
a volcano to burn and heal itself.

MOLTRES is a legendary bird POKéMON
that has the ability to control fire.
If this POKéMON is injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a
volcano to burn and heal itself.

that has the ability to control fire.
If this POKéMON is injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a
volcano to burn and heal itself.

Legendary bird
POKéMON. It is
said to migrate from the south
along with the
spring.

This legendary
bird POKéMON is
said to bring early spring to
the wintry lands
it visits.

This legendary
POKéMON scatters
embers with every flap of its wings.
It is a thrilling
sight to behold.

A legendary bird
POKéMON. As it
flaps its flaming wings, even the
night sky will
turn red.

Known as the
legendary bird of
fire. Every flap of its wings
creates a dazzling
flash of flames.
